translations: n.声明，公开表示；公开宣布

sentences.sentence: The press carried his avowal throughout the country.
sentences.translation: 全国的报纸登载了他承认的消息。

sentences.sentence: Once the first avowal has been made, “I love you” has no meaning whatever.
sentences.translation: 一旦有了第一次的告白，“我爱你”就再没有任何意义。

sentences.sentence: I have said that to you many times, so you don't believe this recent avowal.
sentences.translation: 我已经对你说了许多次了，因此你不相信这最近的声明。
